body_content.explanation: someone who eats a lot of food very quickly:
examples: I asked for more and was made to feel like a fat trougher.
One or two of the dishes may be unfamiliar to even the most adventurous trougher.

body_content.explanation: a person, especially a politician, who gets money, possessions, etc. from other people without doing much to earn them:
examples: Not being a trougher, I bought my computer at my own expense.
I do not think that he can be called a trougher, as I understand he made his money in the oil industry.
